name: groovy_Py
body:
### Welcome to groovy_Py: groovy_Py is a web browser based music consolidation tool. Using YouTube, SoundCloud, GrooveShark API's, as well as your personal music collection groovyPy provides the ultimate access to all your musical interest. This is achieved by combining pythons Tornado web framework websockets in conjunction with pymplayer to play music streams and local music files directly on the desktop well being graphically displayed and controlled via web browser. ### Dependencies:
Tornado
sudo pip install Torndao mplayer
sudo apt-get install mplayer vim ~/.mplayer/config nocache=yes ### Authors and Contributors Author: Rylan Gotto (@gottoii)
Contributors: Micheal McCulloch ### Support or Contact Having trouble, or would like to contribute to the groovyPy project contact me at iamrylangotto@gmail.com
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
